text: "Mr. Brightside" is a 2003 debut single by alternative rock band The Killers and is the leading single from their debut studio album Hot Fuss. It went to number 10 in the United Kingdom and the United States, number 12 in Scotland, number 15 in New Zealand, number 23 in Australia, number 40 Italy and number 48 in Ireland. ==Track listings== UK 7-inch white vinyl (2003) :A.
